Author: garbonzo607#4659
Content: I'm new to Komodo and trying to read up on it. Figured Discord would be a faster way to get answers. So, my question is, if Komodo uses BTC in dPoW, won't Komodo fees increase when BTC fees increase? Won't Komodo fees always be higher than BTC fees, because the blockchain ledger has to be written to Komodo notaries and also the BTC blockchain?

Author: garbonzo607#4659
Content: Also, I'm very interested in side channels like Lightning as the future of scaling blockchain tech. Where can I learn more about how Komodo will be using Lightning?

Author: jorian#4555
Content: Komodo doesn't use lightning, but Komodo has assetchains; completely independent blockchains

Author: jorian#4555
Content: https://docs.komodoplatform.com/komodo/create-Komodo-Assetchain.html

Author: jorian#4555
Content: bit technical, but it shows what is possible

Author: jorian#4555
Content: combine it with BTC security, CryptoConditions smart contract support and you have a killer blockchain. who needs sidechains?

Author: KomodoWorld#8282
Content: @garbonzo607 Komodo fees don't increase if Bitcoin fees increase, only an hash gets written into BTC blockchain. It's a single tx that costs a normal Bitcoin fee and it's paid by Notary Nodes

Author: jorian#4555
Content: the BTC required for those fees were raised in KMD's ICO 2 years ago and can last several more years. Unless lightning doesn't work and we keep using high BTC tx fees
